figure_1: Post-operative radiograph of bilateral knees in anteroposterior view with a broken drain in left knee marked with white arrows.
figure_2: Post-operative radiograph of the left knee in lateral view delineating the broken drain piece with multiple black arrows.
figure_4: A drainpipe of full length showing the drain marker marked with a single black empty arrow along with suction holes in entirety marked with multiple black arrows.
